price: Jedhi: “Gooftaa kiyya! Yoo (adabbii) isaaniif waadaa galame natti agarsiifte,
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
